overview:
As one of the founders of Orbis Media, Akshay plays an instrumental role in business planning and product formulation. Besides this, he also drives marketing, strategy, corporate relations, partnerships and alliances.

Armed with a BE from Amaravati University, Akshay began his career in marketing and product development with textile, manufacturing and export organizations. After four years, he shifted to the software industry and has been crossing many professional milestones over the last nine years. From the beginning of his career, he worked on various leadership roles in marketing, product development, testing and managing engineering groups. While leading and managing software engineering teams, he has overseen all aspects of the software industry. His expertise in cross-functional areas has helped him scale up his vision.
